name: formlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has no clear shape or structure: I looked down at myself; my clothes hung formlessly on my thin limbs. Most "office trousers" come in drab colours, and are formlessly shaped.
More examplesFewer examplesI wrote the ideas down hastily, formlessly, just as they came to me.The film portrays these young people's lives as formlessly dull and depressing.Formlessly, the smells of the city streets washed over me: the aromas of strong cigarettes and mint tea.
